text: Moreover, we should be able to use Custom Company Events in Customer Journey Reports. Now we cannot do that and those events are great insight in terms of ABM reporting.

Time limit on workflow steps?
I have a workflow which sends SMS messages to users who've subscribed to see them.
Sometimes, an SMS fails to send, and it gets stuck in 'attempting to deliver' for a week. I'd like to add some sort of time limit so that if it can't send the text in 5 minutes, it just gives up, so we can at least continue with the rest of the workflow.
Is this possible?

Question - is there a way to activate multiple workflows at one time?
New here so I'm still learning if that feature exists.

Having an issue right now where Get requests in our workflows return an error message that it "does not support a body." Anyone have any thoughts? Tested even using the most basic of requests such as here:
Are you trying to send a get request with a body? I believe you should send any data in the url as params.
Negative. Just the URL in that error above is being sent
It's also worth noting that all our webhooks worked just a few days ago and all of them stopped working today.
